text: The Donnas were a hard rock band from Palo Alto, California. They were formed in 1993. The members are all girls. == Discography == * The Donnas (1997) * American Teenage Rock 'n' Roll Machine (1998) * Get Skintight (1999) * The Donnas Turn 21 (2001) * Spend the Night (2002) * Gold Medal (2004) * Bitchin' (2007) Category:American rock bands Category:American hard rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups from California Category:Palo Alto, California
title: The Donnas
